"ARKS Missions":
"About ARKS Missions
ARKS Missions are a system that allows you to earn rewards by achieving specified missions (targets).

Mission types
・Main Missions
Missions that are added as content and the story progresses.
By completing them in order, you can learn how to play the game.

・Daily Missions
Missions that are updated every day at 15:00.
・Weekly Missions
Missions that are updated every Wed.4:00."

"・Limited Time Missions
Special missions that can only be completed while an event runs. Missions with the icon can be completed multiple times.

・Tier Missions
Missions that you can earn Stars by completing. When you earn 10 Stars, your Tier will increase and you will receive Mission Pass rewards. Tier Missions change every week.
※Star rewards can only be received once per account."

"Confirming missions and receiving rewards
By selecting \"ARKS Missions\" from the main menu, you can check mission contents, view your current progress, and receive rewards.
Please note that there is a deadline to receive rewards from some types of missions.
Displaying mission destinations
For Main Missions, you can display a destination marker on-screen by selecting the mission you want to track.
※If there is no destination, the marker will not be displayed."
